snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Friday’s selections include a review of the Steve Jobs movie and a glam profile of Marissa Mayer as the “it” chief executive.
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Friday’s selections include a review of the Steve Jobs movie and a glam profile of Marissa Mayer as the “it” chief executive.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A Review of 'Jobs' and Marissa Mayer in Vogue
